original_text: And the father of circumcision to them who are not of the circumcision only, but who also walk in the steps of that faith of our father Abraham, which he had being yet uncircumcised.
korean_text: 또한 할례자의 조상이 되었나니 곧 할례 받을 자에게뿐 아니라 우리 조상 아브라함이 무할례시에 가졌던 믿음의 자취를 따르는 자들에게도 그러하니라

sentences.original_text: to them who are not of the circumcision only
but who also walk in the steps of that faith
sentences.korean_translation: 그 믿음의 발자취를 따라 걷는 자들에게도 속하시니

sentences.original_text: which he had being yet uncircumcised
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 아직 할례받지 않았을 때 가졌던 믿음의
